attributes.title: DONT GET!!!!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely the worst app i have EVER downloaded. when i tried opening the app it crashed right away. this app also steals your microwaves AND IT EVEN TOO MY REFRIGERATOR!!!! i would never. EVER. recommend this app to anyone. terrible experience.

attributes.title: mistake🧚‍♂️💗💕
attributes.review: bullets shot out of my camera; had to get a new phone because my screen is all cracked and it costs 1000- have no phone now because it delivers Friday;  writing this review on my garage door opener.

attributes.title: Purrrrrrrrr
attributes.review: This app was so bad!!!! The whole set up is horrible and the people who made this app should be ashamed of their work!!!!  Every time I would click  on something it just freeze or exit the app 🧚‍♀️😜💕🧚‍♂️💕☺️

attributes.title: this app doesn’t work
attributes.review: when i opened the app it takes me to a site to adopt animals?? what is this and when i left my phone went black and then had lines going through it and then i reset my phone and went on the app again then it takes me to site for bernie sanders! what is this ?!?!? delete this app from the app store it doesn’t work !!!! if i had a choice i’d give it zero stars !

attributes.title: never again
attributes.review: i opened this app to reveal a CHILD MOLESTER and multi convicted sexual assault criminal on the front page. not only does this app glorify white supremacy but also leads people to believe that being racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, and sexual assault is ok because of the face of the company. 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Full of an ugly Cheeto puff.🤦🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: When I first open up the app all I saw was a Cheeto puff. And I can’t tell you how much I hate Cheeto puffs. And when I was walking my hot Cheeto puff the app tried to steal my hot Cheeto puff, Smh. I almost saw his shrimp when he was getting tanned and that’s in appropriate.

attributes.title: Tiktok do your thing
attributes.review: I’m not even an American. I downloaded this app because I thought I would get free Cheetos with it but all I saw was Donald Trump. Seeing him trigger my PTSD and now I’m in the hospital because of him 🤕🤭This app would not even be accessible.

attributes.title: Hate trump
attributes.review: This hurts my hurt to see people even like this app ,it has offended me as a black female I wish for it to be removed from the App Store. Trump is a Cheeto and looks like and umpalula that was not mad right. I hope people can realize what a snob he is.

attributes.title: Horrific App.
attributes.review: This is probably the worst app I have ever used. It barely works and the content creators are posting nude pictures of Donald trump on the sight which is unbearably disgusting. Overall this is the worst app I have ever used and I will not be returning to it.

This app is so bad I was horrified when I saw this Cheeto puff looking thing we call a president dont anybody want to see that and we all know that he is bald headed 👨‍🦲 this is what is the worst app ever created and he shouldn’t be president no more so don’t vote for Trump🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮
